description: DEVELOPMENT OF THE SYSTEM TO MONITOR ACHIEVEMENT OF THE MDG

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: Development of the system of additional MDG-related targets and indicators and methodology of their monitoring; development of the organizational and technological schemes of collection and processing MDG-related monitoring data; preparation of annual and five-year MDG progress reports, carrying out broad public discussions about their findings, submission of these reports to the UN on behalf of the Government of Belarus; submission of proposals related to policy adjustments necessary to attain MDGs to the Government of Belarus.
subproject.title: DEVELOPMENT OF THE SYSTEM TO M
